title: Emerald Cascade Polki Haaram - Emerald & Diamond Grandeur
features: A stunning contemporary interpretation of the traditional Haaram, featuring a geometric pattern of square-cut emeralds and dazzling Polki diamonds. The necklace culminates in a mesmerizing pear-shaped emerald drop, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds. The setting showcases the brilliance of the Polki diamonds and the vibrant green of the emeralds. A secure and elegant clasp ensures comfortable wear.

description: This Emerald Cascade Polki Haaram seamlessly blends traditional Indian jewelry design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality emeralds and ethically sourced Polki diamonds ensures brilliance and lasting value. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and enduring style. Its versatility makes it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The Polki diamonds symbolize purity and tradition, while the emerald signifies growth and prosperity.
